content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Farhad. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment. What price were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I would like to rent the apartment for 500 Euro per month. It is a fair price for such a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro is much lower than my expectations. This apartment is in a prime location and offers a modern, comfortable living space. I'm looking for a price that reflects its value. How about we start at 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 700 Euro per month would be a better price for me. It is a good middle ground between your initial price and my offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euro is still lower than what I'm seeking. This apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. I believe 850 Euro per month would be a more appropriate reflection of its worth. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 750 Euro per month would be a fair price. It is a good middle ground between your initial price and my offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, but I'm afraid 750 Euro is still not enough for this apartment. The location and quality of the space are very attractive, and I believe a price of 875 Euro per month would be more in line with its value. Would you consider this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
775 Euro per month would be a fair price. It is a good middle ground between your initial price and my offer.
[/generator]
I'm sorry, but 775 Euro is still not sufficient for this apartment. The amenities and location are highly desirable, and I believe a price of 888 Euro per month would be a better reflection of its value. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 888 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
